videoSnippet.title: Fischer's "First Time" Taking The Poisoned Pawn
videoSnippet.description:
Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/

0:00 Hello Everyone!
01:15 Game starts!
07:55 CNG
10:10 Pause the video 
10:00 IWITP!
12:20 Legends Of The Channel!

Istvan Bilek vs Robert James Fischer
"One Man's Meat is Another Man's Poison" (game of the day Nov-06-2014)
Stockholm Interzonal (1962), Stockholm SWE, rd 5, Feb-03
Sicilian Defense: Najdorf Variation. Poisoned Pawn Accepted (B97

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cd4 4. Nd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 a6 6. Bg5 e6 7. f4 Qb6 8. Qd2 Qb2 9. Rb1 Qa3 10. e5 de5 11. fe5 Nfd7 12. Bc4 Be7 13. Be6 O-O 14. O-O Bg5 15. Qg5 h6 16. Qh4 Qc3 17. Rf7 Rf7 18. Qd8 Nf8 19. Bf7 Kf7 20. Rf1 Kg6 21. Rf8 Bd7 22. Nf3 Qe3 23. Kh1 Qc1 24. Ng1 Qc2 25. Rg8 Qf2 26. Rf8 Qa2 27. Rf3 Kh7
